mapper.select: SELECT machine.id, machine.machine_name AS machineName, machine.machine_ip AS machineIp, machine.virtual_ip AS virtualIp, info.total_cpu AS totalCPU, info.total_memory AS totalMemory, info.used_cpu AS usedCPU, info.used_memory AS usedMemory, info.create_time AS createTime FROM t_machine machine LEFT JOIN t_collect_machine info ON info.machine_id = machine.id
